meanings.definition: To cause a satellite or spacecraft to descend from orbit.
meanings.sent1: The engineers are deorbiting the satellite for a controlled reentry.
meanings.sent2: The astronauts will be deorbiting the spacecraft after completing their mission.
meanings.sent3: The satellite felt like it was deorbiting gracefully, like a dancer twirling down.
meanings.sent4: The spacecraft was deorbiting slowly, like a leaf falling from a tree.
meanings.sent5: The image of the satellite deorbiting left a lasting impression on the observers.

meanings.definition: The act of descending from orbit.
meanings.sent1: The deorbiting of the satellite was a critical step in the mission.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the deorbiting of the spacecraft was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent3: The deorbiting of the satellite seemed like a graceful dance in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The deorbiting of the spacecraft was like a slow-motion descent from space.
meanings.sent5: The deorbiting of the satellite painted a vivid picture against the backdrop of stars.
